overview:
Coy Gupta is the co-founder and CEO of Inviv, a serial innovator and entrepreneur at his core.

Inviv is an innovative education software company that creates education performance measurement and career path development tools. Balancing the two, the platform uses a combination of analytics and crowd sourced data to help students realize a career, rather than focusing only on academic grades.

Prior to Inviv, Coy has held positions at DNC, EDMC and Aviareps GMBH in technology management capacities. He is the creator of Turbopolitics - a viral video platform, iLingos - a website translator and Bdoc - a travel booking application. Coy also founded Autobuzz Media, an automotive entertainment media company that covered automotive events all over the world while hosting the worlds largest performance automotive gallery on the web. Autobuzz produced three movies and worked with Universal Studios on the Fast and Furious series and Rockstar Games on Midnight Club games. The company also worked with automakers including Ford Motor Cars and Mazda of North America. Autobuzz was sold in 2003.
